version_description: Fixed: a new bug in version 1.2.17 was causing crashes upon app launch.
Fixed: a new bug in version 1.2.17 was causing crashes upon app launch.

Improvements:

- Show the subscription price and term on the 'subscribe' screen.
- Localize the subscription price (e.g. quote it in local currency) everywhere it's shown.

Improvements:

- Show the subscription price and term on the 'subscribe' screen.
- Localize the subscription price (e.g. quote it in local currency) everywhere it's shown.

BUGFIXES

- In versions 1.2.8 and 1.2.9, some users were unable to launch the app when not connected to the Internet. (Offline listening is a key use case.)

IMPROVEMENTS

- Smoother 'signup' and 'subscribe' flows.

BUGFIXES

- In versions 1.2.8 and 1.2.9, some users were unable to launch the app when not connected to the Internet. (Offline listening is a key use case.)

IMPROVEMENTS

- Smoother 'signup' and 'subscribe' flows.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Performance improvements.
Performance improvements.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.

Bug fix: we now automatically sync your queue across devices to which you're logged in using the same Audm account. (Note that the app might get confused if you try to make queue changes on two devices *simultaneously*. But it should handle things just fine if you make a queue change on one device, wait a minute or two, and then launch Audm on a different device.)

Bug fix: we now automatically sync your queue across devices to which you're logged in using the same Audm account. (Note that the app might get confused if you try to make queue changes on two devices *simultaneously*. But it should handle things just fine if you make a queue change on one device, wait a minute or two, and then launch Audm on a different device.)
Fixed: a new bug in version 1.2.17 was causing crashes upon app launch.
Fixed: a new bug in version 1.2.17 was causing crashes upon app launch.
Housekeeping. Sometimes code just needs some tidying up.
Housekeeping. Sometimes code just needs some tidying up.
Fixed: a bug that could cause the app to crash when a user opened it by tapping/swiping a push notification.
Fixed: a bug that could cause the app to crash when a user opened it by tapping/swiping a push notification.
More playback speed options.
More playback speed options.

Fixed:

- A bug that could cause the app to lose track of your progress in an article (in a big way, we're talking more than a 15-second mismatch) if you'd been playing the article while the app was in the background and iOS later killed the app to free up memory.

Fixed:

- A bug that could cause the app to lose track of your progress in an article (in a big way, we're talking more than a 15-second mismatch) if you'd been playing the article while the app was in the background and iOS later killed the app to free up memory.
First in a series of updates modernizing our UI for iPhone X. In this update we've tackled our playback screen.
First in a series of updates modernizing our UI for iPhone X. In this update we've tackled our playback screen.
Fixed: A bug in 1.2.23 that could cause the app to crash on devices running iOS 10.
Fixed: A bug in 1.2.23 that could cause the app to crash on devices running iOS 10.

- A critical fix that significantly speeds up the app when the user's queue is long.
- A raft of small changes and fixes that add up to improved stability.
- Update so we're compatible with Swift 4.1.

- A critical fix that significantly speeds up the app when the user's queue is long.
- A raft of small changes and fixes that add up to improved stability.
- Update so we're compatible with Swift 4.1.
Better logging, to help us track down the cause of the random pausing some users report.
Better logging, to help us track down the cause of the random pausing some users report.
Fixes a critical bug introduced in 1.3.3: Some new users were not being permitted to start free trials and thus could not use the app at all.
Fixes a critical bug introduced in 1.3.3: Some new users were not being permitted to start free trials and thus could not use the app at all.
Various performance improvements.
Various performance improvements.
Fixes an problem some users had filtering by publication in the Discover tab.
Fixes an problem some users had filtering by publication in the Discover tab.

- Playback resumes more reliably when you return from an audio interruption (e.g. a phone call or turn-by-turn directions)
- We now very rarely need to ask for your Apple ID and password
- We no longer present the 'Playing' screen just because you've added something new to your queue
- Subscription status tracking is improved
- There's more deep-linking functionality

- Playback resumes more reliably when you return from an audio interruption (e.g. a phone call or turn-by-turn directions)
- We now very rarely need to ask for your Apple ID and password
- We no longer present the 'Playing' screen just because you've added something new to your queue
- Subscription status tracking is improved
- There's more deep-linking functionality
Fixes a crash that could happen when you navigated between publisher filters or when you did a search.
Fixes a crash that could happen when you navigated between publisher filters or when you did a search.
Fix a crash that affected some users upon app launch.
Fix a crash that affected some users upon app launch.
Fix issue where 'Manage Subscription' button wasn't showing up for some users.
Fix issue where 'Manage Subscription' button wasn't showing up for some users.
Deep linking tweak.
Deep linking tweak.
Analytics tweak.
Analytics tweak.
Clearer statement of free trial length. Improved analytics.
Clearer statement of free trial length. Improved analytics.
Tweaks the way each article's publication date is displayed.
Tweaks the way each article's publication date is displayed.
Fixes a crash some users reported when tapping an article on 'History' screen. Eliminates (!!) a set of unwanted pausing behaviors.
Fixes a crash some users reported when tapping an article on 'History' screen. Eliminates (!!) a set of unwanted pausing behaviors.
Improved analytics.
Improved analytics.
Bugfixes
Bugfixes
Bugfix.
Bugfix.
Bugfixes and speedups. Also, users now get to preview some articles before starting a free trial! No big deal.
Bugfixes and speedups. Also, users now get to preview some articles before starting a free trial! No big deal.
Bugfixes.
Bugfixes.
Non-U.S. prices now display correctly.
Non-U.S. prices now display correctly.
Small tweaks.
Small tweaks.

- Various bugfixes and optimizations
- New splash screen
- Easier access to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

- Various bugfixes and optimizations
- New splash screen
- Easier access to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

- Fixes a bug where the 'link your Facebook account' screen was being hidden after appearing.
- Speedups and analytics improvements.

- Fixes a bug where the 'link your Facebook account' screen was being hidden after appearing.
- Speedups and analytics improvements.

- Big reduction in how often articles can get stuck in a 'buffering' state. (We are cautiously hoping that this will never be seen again.)
- Big reduction in the performance hit from having a lot of articles in your queue.

- Big reduction in how often articles can get stuck in a 'buffering' state. (We are cautiously hoping that this will never be seen again.)
- Big reduction in the performance hit from having a lot of articles in your queue.
No longer a problem if a user accidentally adds a space after their email address when signing in.
No longer a problem if a user accidentally adds a space after their email address when signing in.

- Fixes a new bug that sometimes resulted in a user's place in an article being lost
- Fixes language on our Create Account screen indicating how many steps are involved in getting started

- Fixes a new bug that sometimes resulted in a user's place in an article being lost
- Fixes language on our Create Account screen indicating how many steps are involved in getting started
Fixes the way we resume playback after a short audio interruption. (It's about time we started playing nice with turn-by-turn directions!)
Fixes the way we resume playback after a short audio interruption. (It's about time we started playing nice with turn-by-turn directions!)
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.
Minor bugfixes.
Three separate kinds of performance improvement, any of which on its own would have been the biggest performance improvement in the app's history.
Three separate kinds of performance improvement, any of which on its own would have been the biggest performance improvement in the app's history.
Internal bugfix.
Internal bugfix.
Fixes an issue where having a lot of articles in your queue could result in long pauses between paragraphs, especially when playing an article with the device in lock mode.
Fixes an issue where having a lot of articles in your queue could result in long pauses between paragraphs, especially when playing an article with the device in lock mode.

Fix an issue where some users kept having to re-download already-downloaded articles, meaning they couldn't listen to those articles when in offline mode (or when off wifi, unless they chose to allow the app to download using their cell data plan).

Fix an issue where some users kept having to re-download already-downloaded articles, meaning they couldn't listen to those articles when in offline mode (or when off wifi, unless they chose to allow the app to download using their cell data plan).

- Dramatically improves performance and reduces crash-proneness, especially for users on older devices
- Adds new ways to filter the Audm catalogue — by author! by narrator! (and more types of filtering options are coming soon)
- Makes History screen much more reliable
- Fixes several CarPlay bugs

- Dramatically improves performance and reduces crash-proneness, especially for users on older devices
- Adds new ways to filter the Audm catalogue — by author! by narrator! (and more types of filtering options are coming soon)
- Makes History screen much more reliable
- Fixes several CarPlay bugs
Bug fix — improves stability and performance for power users.
Bug fix — improves stability and performance for power users.
Sharing functionality! And a host of other small improvements.
Sharing functionality! And a host of other small improvements.
Smoother resumption of playback after certain audio interruptions. Snappier History screen experience. Various other bugfixes.
Smoother resumption of playback after certain audio interruptions. Snappier History screen experience. Various other bugfixes.
Bugfixes and a user-feedback process that's easier to access.
Bugfixes and a user-feedback process that's easier to access.

Fixes a bug that affected a small number of users but in a really annoying way — sometimes one random paragraph in an article would just refuse to play, even though the paragraphs around it were fine.

Fixes a bug that affected a small number of users but in a really annoying way — sometimes one random paragraph in an article would just refuse to play, even though the paragraphs around it were fine.

You can now filter articles by duration! Long articles, medium-length articles, short* articles — we've got them all.

* Short by the standards of longform journalism, of course

You can now filter articles by duration! Long articles, medium-length articles, short* articles — we've got them all.

* Short by the standards of longform journalism, of course

- The 'Authors' menu now has a tappable alphabetical index
- A bunch of small bugfixes

- The 'Authors' menu now has a tappable alphabetical index
- A bunch of small bugfixes
Small bug fixes.
Small bug fixes.
Major improvement in how we handle audio interruptions, especially from turn-by-turn directions.
Major improvement in how we handle audio interruptions, especially from turn-by-turn directions.
Much less risk of a crash when you background the app after playing several articles in a row.
Much less risk of a crash when you background the app after playing several articles in a row.
Playback controls remain visible as you move from screen to screen. Plus various bugfixes.
Playback controls remain visible as you move from screen to screen. Plus various bugfixes.
Fix for 'Manage Subscription' button. Also more fixes to notifications.
Fix for 'Manage Subscription' button. Also more fixes to notifications.
Small fixes.
Small fixes.

This release introduces in-app messaging capabilities and fixes some small issues.

In loving memory of Christian P. Brink.
